edu.snu.onyx.runtime.master.scheduler

Class RoundRobinSchedulingPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.onyx.runtime.master.scheduler.RoundRobinSchedulingPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchedulingPolicy

    @ThreadSafe
public final class RoundRobinSchedulingPolicy
extends Object
implements SchedulingPolicy
    A Round-Robin implementation used by BatchSingleJobScheduler. This policy keeps a list of available ExecutorRepresenter for each type of container. The RR policy is used for each container type when trying to schedule a task group.

    • Method Detail

      • getScheduleTimeoutMs

        public long getScheduleTimeoutMs()
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingPolicy
        Returns this scheduling policy's timeout before an executor assignment.
        Specified by:
        getScheduleTimeoutMs in interface SchedulingPolicy
        Returns:
        the timeout in milliseconds.

      • attemptSchedule

        public Optional<String> attemptSchedule(ScheduledTaskGroup scheduledTaskGroup)
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingPolicy
        Attempts to schedule the given taskGroup to an executor according to this policy. If there is no executor available for the taskGroup, it waits for an executor to be assigned before it times out. (Depending on the executor's resource type)
        Specified by:
        attemptSchedule in interface SchedulingPolicy
        Parameters:
        scheduledTaskGroup - to schedule
        Returns:
        the ID of the executor on which the taskGroup is scheduled if successful, an empty Optional otherwise.

      • onExecutorAdded

        public void onExecutorAdded(String executorId)
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingPolicy
        Adds the executorId to the pool of available executors. Unlocks this policy to schedule a next taskGroup if locked. (Depending on the executor's resource type)
        Specified by:
        onExecutorAdded in interface SchedulingPolicy
        Parameters:
        executorId - for the executor that has been added.

      • onExecutorRemoved

        public Set<String> onExecutorRemoved(String executorId)
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingPolicy
        Deletes the executorId from the pool of available executors. Locks this policy from scheduling if there is no more executor currently available for the next taskGroup. (Depending on the executor's resource type)
        Specified by:
        onExecutorRemoved in interface SchedulingPolicy
        Parameters:
        executorId - for the executor that has been deleted.
        Returns:
        the ids of the set of task groups that were running on the executor.

      • onTaskGroupScheduled

        public void onTaskGroupScheduled(String executorId,
                                 ScheduledTaskGroup scheduledTaskGroup)
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingPolicy
        Marks the executorId scheduled for the taskGroup. Locks this policy from scheduling if there is no more executor currently available for the next taskGroup. (Depending on the executor's resource type)
        Specified by:
        onTaskGroupScheduled in interface SchedulingPolicy
        Parameters:
        executorId - of the executor assigned for the taskGroup.
        scheduledTaskGroup - scheduled to the executorId.

      • onTaskGroupExecutionComplete

        public void onTaskGroupExecutionComplete(String executorId,
                                         String taskGroupId)
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingPolicy
        Marks the taskGroup's completion in the executor. Unlocks this policy to schedule a next taskGroup if locked. (Depending on the executor's resource type)
        Specified by:
        onTaskGroupExecutionComplete in interface SchedulingPolicy
        Parameters:
        executorId - of the executor where the taskGroup's execution has completed.
        taskGroupId - whose execution has completed.

      • onTaskGroupExecutionFailed

        public void onTaskGroupExecutionFailed(String executorId,
                                       String taskGroupId)
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingPolicy
        Marks the taskGroup's failure in the executor. Unlocks this policy to reschedule this taskGroup if locked. (Depending on the executor's resource type)
        Specified by:
        onTaskGroupExecutionFailed in interface SchedulingPolicy
        Parameters:
        executorId - of the executor where the taskGroup's execution has failed.
        taskGroupId - whose execution has completed.
